message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since it's my turn next round and inflation will hurt my earnings.
Let's be fair, Alice.  You got the better deal last round, so I'll take a bit more this time.  If we keep splitting it evenly, we both get less as inflation bites.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm losing money with every round we play, and you're just holding out for a better deal. This offer is still generous considering the inflation.
